name: Ancient Wind Dragon
description: The Ancient Wind Dragon embodies the destructive force of storms, with formidable nature, exceptional strength, and a chaotic presence. It features gale force winds surrounding its body, making it difficult to hit.
memorable: Its ability to deflect ordinary projectiles, high damage output, and the ability to create fear make it a terrifying adversary.
goals: To wreak havoc, control the battlefield, and maintain its dominance over storms and winds.
relations: It could ally with other dragons or storm-related creatures, serving as a master of storms or as a fearsome foe against intruders.
environment: Typically found in stormy regions or high mountains, where thunderstorms are frequent.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage, high damage output, and significant control over the battlefield.
weaknesses: May struggle against coordinated efforts from multiple foes.
attacks: Multiattack with Frightful Presence, Bite, Claw, and Tail attacks, unleashing devastating storm-based attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest Breath, a powerful cone attack that damages and knocks enemies back.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and an exceptional passive perception score of 27.
skills: Excels in Acrobatics and Perception, showcasing its agile and aware nature.
additional_information: Freedom of Movement allows the dragon to ignore difficult terrain.
Legendary Resistance lets it succeed on saving throws three times a day.
Storm Sight enables it to see through fog and mist.
Whirling Winds grant a strong defensive advantage against ranged attackers.
Can take legendary actions to enhance its combat capabilities.
